text: NGC 434 is a spiral galaxy of type SAB(s)ab located in the constellation Tucana. It was discovered on October 28, 1834 by John Herschel. It was described by Dreyer as "bright, small, round, pretty suddenly bright middle." ==References== ==External links== * 0433 18341028 Category:Tucana (constellation) Category:Spiral galaxies
title: NGC 434
